findings.title: Rescue function for mistakenly sent funds is missing
findings.description: The rescue function for mistakenly sent funds is missing in the contract. If a user sends the funds by mistake to the contract then there is no way to pull the funds out by the admin and give it back to the user.

findings.title: Gas optimizations
findings.description: In for loop on line 186 (MaticX) and 111 (Validator Registry) the .length is calculated again and again in the for loop which will use a SLOAD operation on each iteration

findings.title: Missing Authentication
findings.description: Contract: Missing implementation of contracts (state Manager and Validator share). As there are external calls to the missing contracts so the contract methods which are dependent on external calls will fail.
